TopicTitle: Anyone know of a good inline parachute?

Articles.Content:
As the name suggests, does anyone know of a mod that has a good inline parachute?

EDIT: Also I would prefer if I could use them with stock 1M and 2M parts.
I cant think of an addon in-line chute, but it is possible to fit one of those radial attachment points on top of a 1 meter chute so you can attach more parts after it such as a docking port

There are parachutes with stack nodes on top in NovaPunch.

Or, you can also create your own out of stock parts, if you use part-clipping...

Edited May 2, 2013 by RoboRay
They're out there. Didn't KSPX have a few? I went minimalist for 0.19, but I can always fire up my main 0.18 install to check which ones I was using.
u tend to Put 2 or 3 Radial parachutes On a 2m Stack Separator... below The Capsule So i can Jettision It When Not needed... (mainly for Sky-crane style Descent's on Duna)

There are parachutes with stack nodes on top in NovaPunch.

Or, you can also create your own out of stock parts, if you use part-clipping...

This seems to work pretty well. Thanks for the help!

If you use part clipping...

You can do this:

I've found that inverting parts on nodes like that can make it difficult to attach other things to the nodes.

I also try not to use part clipping in ways that simply put a part inside another part, unless there's room for it (such as the parachute going into the hollow void inside a decoupler).
